attributes.action: Former soldier Ray Coulson rights to have his family stay in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Former soldier Ray Coulson aged 42 served in the British Army for 22 years. His wife and children are Canadian citizens. Ray Coulson has now left the armed forces and has been told as he is no longer serving in the service, his Canadian family has to leave the UK.

Please have this decision overturned. He risked his life for us, pay him back by keeping his family in the UK.
